Package danfulea.utils

Provides classes for various common tasks.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MessageRetriever
    A simple interface for message fetching!
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AboutFrame
    This is the standard About Frame template.
    AlertBox
    A simple dialog box with two yes/no options (it uses fx technology).
    CheckedInputStream Deprecated
    CheckedOutputStream Deprecated
    ExampleFileFilter
    A convenience implementation of FileFilter that filters out all files except for those type extensions that it knows about.
    FileOperation
    Class used for handling copy operations! It is thread-safe because the only static member that matters, i.e.
    FrameUtilities
    JFrame utilities class!
    ListUtilities
    List utilities class for handling operations with Strings.
    LookAndFeel
    Utility class for loading look and feel (LF) in order to have nice-looking GUI.
    PDFRenderer
    Utility class for creating PDF file, mainly used for converting long string (which also populate, say, a JTextArea in main application) into a PDF.
    ScanDisk
    ScanDisk utilities.
    ScanDiskLFGui
    Scan disk and look and feel GUI!
    Also display some gadgets such as an elegant clock and color chooser!
    SplashWindow
    Splash window that displays an image for a given time or until the user clicks on it with their mouse.
    SystemInfo
    Utility class for displaying some system information.
    TimeUtilities
    Time utilities class.

Package danfulea.utils Description

Provides classes for various common tasks.
Version:
2.0
Author:
Dan Fulea
